info.title: Umbraco Commerce Storefront API
info.description: Describes the Umbraco Commerce Storefront API, the front end headless API for Umbraco Commerce cart management and checkout processing.

get.description:
Start the hosted payment process for the given order redirecting to the payment gateway.

Endpoint URL should be launched in a WebView and developers should watch for changes in the WebView URL to detect the outcome of the transaction. Final endpoint URLs will be one of `{endpointUrl}/completed`, `{endpointUrl}/canceled` or `{endpointUrl}/errored`

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order being checked out

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The checkout token for the checkout session

get.description: Initialize a hosted checkout flow, generating a checkout token to be passed to the `/pay` endpoint.

parameters.name: Store
parameters.description: The ID or the alias of the store

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order being checked out

post.description: Confirms an order, updating the transaction info with the supplied details and transitions the order from a `open` to a `finalized` state

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: API key specified through configuration to authorize access to the API.

parameters.name: Store
parameters.description: The ID or the alias of the store

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order being checked out

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Defines the properties that should be expanded in the response

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Limit the properties returned in the response

get.description:
Initialize an inline checkout flow.

With inline checkout flow it's the developers responsibility to capture the transaction and confirm the payment via the `/confirm` endpoint. The selected payment methods setting are returned to ease payment gateway configuation, along with details of any meta data the payment method expects to be captured.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: API key specified through configuration to authorize access to the API.

parameters.name: Store
parameters.description: The ID or the alias of the store

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order being checked out

get.description: Fetches a variant from an Umbraco Commerce multi-variant property on the given content node with the supplied attribute combination.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the content item that has an Umbraco Commerce variants property editor defined on it

parameters.name: attribute
parameters.description: The checkout token for the checkout session

get.description: Fetches all the countries belonging to a given store, optionally filtered by the supplied filter argument.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: API key specified through configuration to authorize access to the API.

parameters.name: Store
parameters.description: The ID or the alias of the store

parameters.name: Current-Order
parameters.description: The ID of the current order associated with the current session

parameters.name: Billing-Country
parameters.description: The ID or alias of the session default billing country

parameters.name: Billing-Region
parameters.description: The ID or alias of the session default billing region

parameters.name: Shipping-Country
parameters.description: The ID or alias of the session default shipping country

parameters.name: Shipping-Region
parameters.description: The ID or alias of the session default shipping region

parameters.name: Tax-Class
parameters.description: The ID or alias of the session default tax class

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: The ID or alias of the session currency

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The ISO culture code of the current session culture

parameters.name: Customer-Reference
parameters.description: The unique reference for the customer associated with the current session

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter the returned list of items

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Defines the properties that should be expanded in the response

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Limit the properties returned in the response
